I've played this game since June 2017 (4 years). I would recommend you to give it a try since it's a free game from 2020.
But you should know one fact that many people quit playing this game for a long time, all players are just new to the game, I can guarantee that the game is full of cheaters whether with a cheap cheat or expensive. You'll see all kind of troll kids who just made new accounts to try a cheat software.

By the way, this is not the only series of Counter-Strike old product that have cheaters, almost all its series have at least half of community players are cheaters. Like an old Counter-Strike: Source. I remember playing it with mods, full of cheaters, as well CS 1.6 in the past was totally insane of cheaters existence in 2005.

- 6th of July, 2021
